metadata.title: CVE-2016-3744 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Buffer overflow in the create_pbuf function in btif/src/btif_hh.c inBluetooth in Android 4.x before 4.4.4, 5.0.x before 5.0.2, 5.1.x before5.1.1, and 6.x before 2016-07-01 allows remote attackers to gain privilegesvia a crafted pairing operation, aka internal bug 27930580.

criterions.comment: android: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
